img.div:
Dr. Craig W. Helmstedter
Welcome to the Ocean View School District. I am pleased to work with such dedicated teachers and support staff to implement our revised Mission: Ocean View School District ensures that all students achieve academic success and are prepared to live and learn in a rapidly changing world by providing rigorous and relevant learning experiences and empowering families and staff to work together. We are refocusing our time, energy and resources on rigorous and relevant first instruction.
The Governing Board has also strengthened the Core Values Statement to better align with the revised Mission. Our values include developing students’ health and wellness, maintaining safe and beautiful schools, as well as ensuring academic success and developing lifelong learners.
Our next step will be to revise our Vision for Learning based on the Mission and Core Values. The Vision for Learning will serve to guide our efforts over the next several years to fulfill our Mission and live our Core Values.
Please click anywhere on this message to view the Mission and Core Values in English and Spanish. I welcome you to share your comments and thoughts with me at chelmstedter@oceanviewsd.org.
Bienvenido al Distrito Escolar Ocean View. Me complace trabajar con maestros dedicados y personal de apoyo para implementar nuestra Misión revisada: El Distrito Escolar Ocean View asegura que todos los estudiantes logren éxito académico y estén preparados para vivir y aprender en un mundo que cambia rápidamente, por medio de proveer experiencias de aprendizaje rigurosas y relevantes y además empoderar a familias y empleados a trabajar juntos. Estamos reenfocando nuestro tiempo, energía y recursos en instrucción de calidad rigurosa y relevante.
La Mesa Directiva también ha reforzado los Valores Fundamentales del Distrito Escolar Ocean View para alinearse mejor con la Misión revisada. Nuestros valores incluyen desarrollar la salud y el bienestar de los estudiantes, mantener escuelas seguras y hermosas, así como garantizar el éxito académico y ser un aprendiz de por vida.
Nuestro próximo paso será revisar nuestra Visión para el Aprendizaje basada en el Estado de Misión y Valores Fundamentales. La Visión para el Aprendizaje servirá para guiar nuestros esfuerzos durante los próximos años para cumplir nuestra Misión y vivir nuestros Valores Fundamentales.
Haga clic en cualquier parte de este mensaje para ver la Misión y los Valores Fundamentales en inglés y español. Los invito a compartir sus comentarios y pensamientos conmigo a chelmstedter@oceanviewsd.org.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.

button.class: btn btn-default
btn sb-organization-color-element-bg

div.p: As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
